explains: n. 排练，排演；预演，演习；复述，重复

sentences.en: We only had six days of rehearsal.
sentences.cn: 我们只有六天的排练时间。

sentences.en: The rehearsal process also irked him increasingly.
sentences.cn: 排练过程也更加让他厌烦。

sentences.en: The rehearsal studio is buzzing with lunchtime activity.
sentences.cn: 排练场被午餐时段活动搞得很热闹。
